ygData.subject: RE: dual weild
ygData.msgSnippet: Having gotten my 17th song recently, I can say that I put no points into my dual wield at all, I just tried wielding a Dagger in my off hand and that worked
ygData.messageBody:
Having gotten my 17th song recently, I can say that I put no points into my
dual wield at all, I just tried wielding a Dagger in my off hand and that
worked fine.

The odd part was that my first improve message was to 36, so I wonder
if that's a bug, of if punching brings it up somehow, too.

Quies
17th Song, Karana

At 11:18 AM 1999-11-17 , you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>like many skills (e.g. warrior's double attack) i thought we had to put 1
>skill point into duel wield to learn the basics. could be wrong though
>hehe.
>
>Shada
>
> >
> > One final note on DW, is you need to place no skill points in
> > it at all for
> > it to go up. You get it free at 17th level.
> >
> >
> > Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
